mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.report.impl.HcPoResultMapper.selecthcPoResultSubList] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , B.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO , C.CONFIRM_QTY , B.DELVRY_QTY , NVL2(A.DELVRY_GI_DT, B.DELVRY_QTY, 0) AS GI_QTY , NVL(D.RCIPT_QTY, 0) AS GR_QTY , NVL(D.FAIL_QTY, 0) AS GR_FAIL_QTY , B.STOCK_ID , B.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = B.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE) AS STOCK_NAME , A.MEM_ACC_ID , (SELECT MEM_ACC_NAME FROM FCM0006M WHERE MEM_ACC_ID = A.MEM_ACC_ID) AS MEM_ACC_NAME , TO_DATE(A.DELVRY_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DELVRY_DT , A.DELVRY_GI_DT AS DELVRY_GI_DT FROM HMC0007M A , HMC0008D B , HMC0005D C , ( SELECT B.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , B.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO , SUM(B.RCIPT_QTY) AS RCIPT_QTY , SUM(B.QC_FAIL_QTY) AS FAIL_QTY FROM HMC0009M A -- GR , HMC0010D B WHERE A.HMC_GR_NO = B.HMC_GR_NO AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND A.GR_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , B.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO ) D WHERE A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND B.PO_NO = C.PO_NO AND B.PO_DTL_NO = C.PO_DTL_NO AND B.HMC_DELVRY_NO = D.HMC_DELVRY_NO (+) AND B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO = D.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO (+) AND B.PO_NO = D.PO_NO (+) AND B.PO_DTL_NO = D.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} ORDER BY A.HMC_DELVRY_NO ASC, B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO ASC
